title: 3-4 gig update every time i switch between japan/oceanic servers
body: Is this normal? I did the Oceanic 4 gig update yesterday, switched to the japanese servers, did the 3 gig update for there, now ive just hopped back to oceanic and have to do the same 4 gig update i did yesterday. Is there a particular folder this update gets saved to on my computer so i can just copy/paste the region specific one to the destination when i want to hop between them to save a massive download? Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
That sounds pretty strange, so I reached out to our tech team about this and they agree.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can look into this with you directly.

 Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs, and attach it to your ticket for more context.  See you there!
